paragraphs.content: Chapter 4
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 4

paragraphs.content: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;
paragraphs.contentHtml: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;

paragraphs.content: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

paragraphs.content: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;

paragraphs.content: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.

paragraphs.content: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.

paragraphs.content: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

paragraphs.content: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:

paragraphs.content: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

paragraphs.content: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:

paragraphs.content: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.

paragraphs.content: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.

paragraphs.content: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.

paragraphs.content: The cloak that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The cloak that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.

paragraphs.content: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:

paragraphs.content: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.

paragraphs.content: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.
paragraphs.contentHtml: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.

paragraphs.content: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

paragraphs.content: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

paragraphs.content: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.

paragraphs.content: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.

paragraphs.content: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.

paragraphs.content: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.

paragraphs.content: ¶ The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
